text: Man on a Swing is a 1974 American thriller movie directed by Frank Perry and starring Cliff Robertson, Joel Grey, Elizabeth Wilson, George Voskovec, Lane Smith, Peter Masterson, Gil Gerard, Nicholas Pryor, Clarice Blackburn, Penelope Milford, Clarence Felder. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1974 thriller movies Category:American thriller movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Frank Perry
title: Man on a Swing
